@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package com.github.alexjlockwood.kyrie

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animation.BidirectionalValueTransformer<T,V>
    Interface that can transform type T to another type V and back again.
    Animation.ValueTransformer<T,V>
    Interface that can transform type T to another type V.
    KyrieDrawable.Listener
    A listener that receives notifications from an animation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation<T,V>
    An Animation encapsulates the information required to animate a single property of a Node.
    CircleNode
    A Node that paints a circle.
    CircleNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create CircleNodes.
    ClipPathNode
    A Node that defines a region to be clipped.
    ClipPathNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create ClipPathNodes.
    EllipseNode
    A Node that paints an ellipse.
    EllipseNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create EllipseNodes.
    GroupNode
    A Node that holds a group of children Nodes.
    GroupNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create GroupNodes.
    Keyframe<T>
    This class holds a time/value pair for an animation.
    KyrieDrawable
    An animatable drawable based on scalable vector graphics.
    KyrieDrawable.Builder
    Builder class used to create a KyrieDrawable.
    KyrieDrawable.ListenerAdapter
    This adapter class provides empty implementations of the methods from KyrieDrawable.Listener.
    Node
    Base class for all Nodes used to construct and animate a KyrieDrawable.
    Node.Builder<B extends Node.Builder<B>>
    Base class for all Node.Builders used to construct new Node instances.
    PathData
    A simple container class that represents an SVG path string.
    PathNode
    A Node that paints a path.
    PathNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create PathNodes.
    RectangleNode
    A Node that paints a rectangle.
    RectangleNode.Builder
    Builder class used to create RectangleNodes.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Animation.RepeatMode
    Repeat mode determines how a repeating animation should behave once it completes.
    FillType
    Fill type determines how a shape should be filled when painted.
    StrokeLineCap
    Stroke line cap determines the shape that should be used at the corners of stroked paths.
    StrokeLineJoin
    Stroke line join determines the shape that should be used at the ends of a stroked sub-path.
